layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x126
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x126
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x110
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,0) size 200x110 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 198x108
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 198x104
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (2,42) size 57x24 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=0 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 20x19
                text run at (2,2) width 20: "foo"
            LayoutTableCell {TD} at (61,50) size 135x56 [border: (1px inset #808080)] [r=0 c=1 rs=1 cs=1]
              LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (2,2) size 52x52 [border: (1px solid #008000)]
                LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (1,1) size 42x22 [border: (1px solid #FF0000)]
                  LayoutText {#text} at (1,1) size 8x19
                    text run at (1,1) width 8: "d"
